**Public Works**
================

Public Works Director: Joel McCraw | jmccraw@grandsalinetx.gov | office: 903-962-3122 ext. 2203

Utility Billing Clerk: Shannon Phillips |sphillips@grandsalinetx.gov | office: 903-962-3122 ext. 2201

Water On call Emergency: 903-355-4236

Reports
-------

[2024 CCR](https://www.grandsalinetx.gov/s/2024-Consumer-Confidence-Report-Water.pdf)

[2023 CCR](https://www.grandsalinetx.gov/s/2023-CCR-report.pdf)

**Water**
---------

PER ORDINANCE 2023-119: **$15 PENALTY ADDED IF NOT PAID BY 10TH OF MONTH.  
AFTER 4:30 PM ON THE 20TH, AN ADMINISTRATIVE FEE OF  
$50.00 WILL BE ADDED. SERVICE WILL BE DISCONTINUED.  
\*Account must be paid in full before service will be reconnected. \***

For problems concerning water, sewer, streets, or parks please contact City Hall @ 903-962-3122

 To report a light pole outage, please contact SWEPCO at 1-877-237-3656 with the pole number.

**Live Oak Sanitation 936-876-5640**
------------------------------------

### **GUIDELINES FOR TRASH PICK UP:**

1. New Year's Day, Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Days are holidays for Live Oak and trash pick-up will be completed on the day after.

2.  Containers must be placed at the EDGE OF THE STREET BY 7:00 AM.

3.  All bags must be placed in a blue Live Oak Sanitation polycart along with one other unmarked trash cans if needed.

4.   Bagged and tied garbage only, no loose trash in cans.

5.    The bags shall be no more than thirty (30) gallons and weigh no more than fifty (50) pounds.

6.    Boxes, tree trimmings, newspapers/magazines securely tied together forming an easily handled package not exceeding three and a half feet in length or fifty pounds (50) in weight, with a limit of two bundles per week.

7.  Bulky items can be picked up by arrangement by calling City Hall 903-962-3122 ext 2201.

To submit a Work Order please fill out the required fields below. Thank you.
